data.text:
Building the future, together!

Looking for the best place to work as a student or recent university graduate? Come kickstart your career at EPCOR. Year after year, EPCOR has been named as one of Canada's Top Employers for Young People because we help young people get started on a career path, and focus their growth along the way. We offer student opportunities and entry level jobs for new graduates to start building their careers.

While working at EPCOR, you'll develop your skills and learn about different areas of our company. You'll also have the chance to share your knowledge and experience, shaping the future of EPCOR. We offer the following programs:

Summer student program (available in Canada and the United States)

Engineer-in-training program

Finance development program

Co-op program

EPCOR Mentorship Program (available in Canada and the United States)

Summer student recruitment dates

Our summer student positions are posted each spring directly on our website or at relevant post-secondary institutions. We offer full and part-time summer student jobs with flexible schedules and an ability to earn extra money to put towards your studies.

You can use our job search to find EPCOR student jobs. You can also set up job alerts, apply for multiple EPCOR job postings and track your progress through the application process.

Engineer-in-training program

EPCOR offers entry level jobs for recent graduates that are far from your typical starting position. If you are a graduate from an engineering degree program and a registered engineer-in-training with the Association of Professional Engineers and Geoscientists of Alberta (APEGA), you can apply for EPCOR's engineer-in-training program. You'll gain broad and valuable work experience through challenging and strategic rotational assignments. This program is based on the requirements of APEGA.

Engineer-in-training program recruitment dates

We recruit for these positions throughout the year, but openings are typically posted in the summer and early winter months.

You can use our job search to find our engineer-in-training job postings. You can also set up job alerts, apply for multiple EPCOR job postings and track your progress through the application process.

Finance development program

If you graduated with a degree in accounting, finance, or operations management, EPCOR's 3-year finance development program provides some exciting opportunities. You'll rotate through three different areas within the company, spending one year in each area, while paired with a senior-level mentor. We'll also support you in earning a professional designation, such as CPA or CFA.

Don't think of it as entry level jobs for university graduates, but an opportunity to learn about one of the top places to work for recent grads and explore all the different opportunities available at EPCOR.
